124a1('bum): pa nyid la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya
124a2('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de de ltar shes rab
124a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams la
124a4('bum): brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi
124a5('bum): mthong ngo // dbang po rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // stobs rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag
124a6('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // lam rnams la brtson zhes bya ba 'am mi
124a7('bum): brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'artson zhes bya ba 'am mi brtson zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan
1a1('bum): / she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa'i yum gleg bam thog ma'i ka ba bzhugs s+ho//
2a1('bum): nas smye// pra d+hU pa
2a2('bum): da/ sa pa rol tu
2a3('bum): pa steng phrag brgya pa/ gegs pami
2b1('bum): thog ma'o// bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
2b2('bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i
2b3('bum): dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs
2b4('bum): bi la dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi/ dge slong gi dge 'don chen po dang /
3a1('bum): thabs gcig ste/ thams cad dgra bcom pa/ zag bzang
3a2('bum): pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par
3a3('bum): grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cung shes pa/ glang po
3a4('bum): po chen po bababs pa/ bod pa bas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab
3b1('bum): tu thob pa/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas/ sems
3b2('bum): shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha
3b3('bum): stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob pa rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan
3b4('bum): pa dga' bo'o// dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sog
3b5('bum): pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos
4a1('bum): / mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4a2('bum): tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/
4a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon
4a4('bum): lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa
4a5('bum): med pa'i sgribs pa dang ldan pa bstan pa yang mi shes pa las so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul
4b1('bum): khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par rje ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i
4b2('bum): tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag/
4b3('bum): med pa/ grags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa
4b4('bum): dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams
4b5('bum): cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chud pa dang / nyon mongadra pa med pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/
4b6('bum): pha rol po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba
5a1('bum): chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing / bstan pa la mkhas pa/ skal pa grangs med par nas/ smon
5a2('bum): lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ thog mar smra ba/ khro mnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan
5a3('bum): pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa/ dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ spobs pa michod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa/
5a4('bum): zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/
5a5('bum): chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig sgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / nam mkha' dang / dri zi'i
5a6('bum): grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyad lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can thams cad
5b1('bum): kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba'i
5b2('bum): sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos
5b3('bum): zab mo dang ldan pas/ gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin tu thob pa/ las dang nyon
5b4('bum): mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
5b5('bum): tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa/ lta ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldan pa thams cad dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/
5b6('bum): las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos thas cad sgra brnyan
5b7('bum): dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa/ tshad med pa la 'jig pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba
6a1('bum): la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pan
6a2('bum): bzhug pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba thas cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/
6a3('bum): sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba bdab par mkhas pa/ sos can lta ba sna tshog kyis yongasu bskyed pa'i nyon mong pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge
6a4('bum): 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtog par bya bar mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan
6a5('bum): pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub seMs dpa' sos dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas
6a6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
6a7('bum): dpa' chen po ded dpon dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po skyob sbed dang /
6b1('bum): byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang / byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chu
6b2('bum): seMs dpa' sem dpa' chen po blo gros dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po 'phag pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po blo gros 'phel dang / byang chub
6b3('bum): sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub ses dpa' ses dpa' chen po don yong mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po sgrib med po gros dang /
6b4('bum): byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu rabazhug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu ngam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sem dpa' ses dpa' chen
6b5('bum): po brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sem dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
6b6('bum): chen po mi gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpal
6b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po blo gros dpe' med pa dang / byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa
6b8('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stob rab tu 'jom pa dang / byang chub
6'a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
6'a2('bum): chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying cher sems dang / byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po rgyan chen dang / byang chub sems dpa'
6'a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po byams pa dang /
6'a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das
6'a5('bum): kyis ba dan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/ skra drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// der bzhug nas ting nge 'dzin gang du
6'a6('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go/ de nas bcom
6'a7('bum): ldan 'das dgong shing yang dag par mkhyen pas/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhed te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas zhing 'di la rnam par gzig so// de ltar gzig nas/ ska
6'a8('bum): tham cad nas 'od rab tu bkye ste/ de'i nab kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo dri ba stong dang ldan pa gnyis lnga'ang zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs kyi sor mi
6'b1('bum): las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhab kyi long bu gnyis la kyang 'ongad gze bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // zhab byin pa gnyis las
6'b2('bum): kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // zhab pus mo gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // zhabra brla gnyis las kyang
6'b3('bum): 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // sku sta zur gnyis lnga kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas kyang 'od
6'b4('bum): gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // sku rtsib log gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // thug ka'i skyes bu chen po mtshan dpal gyi
6'b5('bum): be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // phyag gi sor bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // phyag lag ngar gnyis las kyang 'ong
6'b6('bum): gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // sku 'phrag pa gnyis lA kyang 'od gzer bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byungango // mgur nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug tu
6'b7('bum): drug cu byung // chem che ba bzhi las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug byung // tshem bzhi bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // spyan gnyis nas
6'b8('bum): kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung // sman gnyis nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bye ga cu drug cu byung // shad kyi sgrub gnyis na ca zhi kye galag khrig tu ma
7a1('bum): sa ldangab/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod suras 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ngo // seng gi spyi gcug nas 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung //
7a2('bum): zhal gi sgo nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu byung ste/ 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug pa de dag thams kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
7a3('bum): 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par bya te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lde phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang /
7a4('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
7a5('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi byem+b+ha snang ba chen pos khyab par byas// byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar
7a6('bum): lho'i phyogs mtshams 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lde nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba
7a7('bum): chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyog mtsha su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
7b1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can pa gang gis 'ong de mthong ba dang /
7b2('bum): 'od nges gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od gzer rab
7b3('bum): tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen po'i khyab par byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi 'aklung gi bye ma snyed snang
7b4('bum): nga chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
7b5('bum): bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig
7b6('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
7b7('bum): byas so// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khaH
7'a1('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
7'a2('bum): byas so// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg
7'a3('bum): par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gi 'od kyis/
7'a4('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do//
7'a5('bum): lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
7'a6('bum): mdzad do// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
7'a7('bum): gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyor
7'b1('bum): mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
7'b2('bum): khyab par mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
7'b3('bum): ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
7'b4('bum): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par
7'b5('bum): mdzad nas/ zhal mdzum pa mdzad do// ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mthon te/ 'od gzer de dag thams cad la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi
7'b6('bum): rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog du snang ba/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/
7'b7('bum): ka tsa lin ti ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur pa sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ pad+mo de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang
8a1('bum): ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag du byen/
8a2('bum): nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de nas lde phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing /
8a3('bum): de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
8a4('bum): gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid chos ston to// de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
8a5('bum): gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag byang shar gyi phyogs mtsham
8a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma sred du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos
8a7('bum): ston to// de dag shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
8b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag sngon gyi rtogs patshams kyi 'jig chen gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byes med du gshegs shing / de dag tu khyen nas/
8b2('bum): 'dis ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa 'di nyid chos ston to// de dag nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshes
8b3('bum): shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag 'og kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
8b4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag steng gi phyogs
8b5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston
8b6('bum): to// sems can gang dag gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom
8b7('bum): ldan 'das kyis bdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do//
9a1('bum): rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnams drug du g.yos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos
9a2('bum): so// kun tu g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun tu 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go// kun tu ldeg go// che mchem/ rab tu chem chem/
9a3('bum): kun tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shig shig/ mtha' mthon ni dbus pal/ dbus
9a4('bum): mthon ni mtha' dma'/ dal bus bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba skyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la stong
9a5('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang /
9a6('bum): ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes par gyur to// rgyal
9a7('bum): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu cu gsum dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal pa mnyam par skyes par
9b1('bum): gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang mi de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas dga' ba dang / mos pa
9b2('bum): dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam
9b3('bum): thang cig la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
9b4('bum): thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / lha
9b5('bum): de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rab rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang / dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba
9b6('bum): thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing
9b7('bum): phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i
10a1('bum): tshe skad cig yudang tsam thang cig la/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi
10a2('bum): skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa
10a3('bum): mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rab rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang
10a4('bum): dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
10a5('bum): sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du deng zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la
10a6('bum): thal me sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams
10a7('bum): cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can thams
10b1('bum): cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rab rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su
10b2('bum): dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzos
10b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing byin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
10b4('bum): la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal
10b5('bum): ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems
10b6('bum): can thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis/ sngon gyi tshe
10b7('bum): rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/
11a1('bum): @de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal de/
11a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la/ thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig
11a3('bum): la/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bya ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang /
11a4('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so//
11a5('bum): de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis/ sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran kyang / dga' ba dang /
11a6('bum): mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
11a7('bum): gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal
11b1('bum): me sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar lce'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal
11b2('bum): ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de
11b3('bum): ngag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes
11b4('bum): su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin
11b5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
11b6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
11b7('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/
12a1('bum): khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga'
12a2('bum): ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang
12a3('bum): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing byin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal
12a4('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal me sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam zang cig la/ nub
12a5('bum): byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
12a6('bum): rten thams cad rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag lha
12a7('bum): de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba
12b1('bum): thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/
12b2('bum): zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig
12b3('bum): yud tsam thang cig la/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin
12b4('bum): rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de
12b5('bum): ngag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams
12b6('bum): bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong
12b7('bum): zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i
13a1('bum): skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol seng gi skye gnas/
13a2('bum): thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khoms pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par
13a3('bum): skyes so// de nas mi de dag lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rdzas su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang /
13a4('bum): nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing
13a5('bum): phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum
13a6('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra
13a7('bum): thos par gyur to// smon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to// gos med pa rnams kyang gos par gyur to//
13b1('bum): dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to// skom pa rnams kyang gtung ba thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur te/
13b2('bum): lus nyams pa dang / dbang po ma tshangs pa rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshangs zhing rgyas par gyur to// ngal ba rnams kyang ngal sos par gyur to// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang
13b3('bum): 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na pa
13b4('bum): dang ma dang pu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' ba dang gnyen pa dang / grog po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems ma nyams pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las
13b5('bum): kyi lam dang ldan zhing / tshangs par spyod pa/ gtsang ba dang / nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa
13b6('bum): 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams
13b7('bum): cad 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o// dul ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// bden pa ni dge ba'o// bag byed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge
14a1('bum): ba'o// snying rje ni dge ba'o// srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ba dan seng
14a2('bum): ge'i khri nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di ltar ste dper na nyim sgribs pa med pa nam mapa'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am/ zla ba ga pa'i sgra ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gcu
14a3('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lham
14a4('bum): yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis
14a5('bum): mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi
14a6('bum): brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang
14a7('bum): sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan
14b1('bum): te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing was me ldan ne ljang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du na pa phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyi/
14b2('bum): mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi
14b3('bum): bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me ldan ne ljang nger bzhug so// de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
14b4('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhug so// de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs/
14b5('bum): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me ldan ne ljang nger bzhugs so//
14b6('bum): de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan na
14b7('bum): lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis
15a1('bum): mdzes shing lham me ldan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang
15a2('bum): sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan
15a3('bum): te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhug so// 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri nag po gzhan zil gyis non par
15a4('bum): gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me ldan ne
15a5('bum): lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i
15a6('bum): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa/ zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid
15a7('bum): dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi skra ci 'dra/
15b1('bum): ba de bzhin du bstan to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
15b2('bum): dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtsha ma dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
15b3('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ba dan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la/ nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/
15b4('bum): lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spos dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / lha rdzas kyi drug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ud pal dang /
15b5('bum): pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka dang / na lin dang / so'u gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ge sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang /
15b6('bum): lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
15b7('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / bdug spos dang / ud pa la dang / pad+mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun ta ri ka dang / na lin dang / so'u gan d+hi dang / me tog ge sa ra dang / tam
16a1('bum): la'i lo ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// mngon par gtor to//
16a2('bum): rab tu gtor to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang / me tog chu las skyes pa dang / zang las skyes
16a3('bum): pa mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
16a4('bum): na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng /
16a5('bum): gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur to// khang pa rtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me
16a6('bum): tog dang / dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to// mngon par 'byang bar gyur to// rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to// me tog dang dar gyi lnga ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
16a7('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin tu mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gsor gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang / shin tu mdzes shing lham me ldan ni lhang nger gyur te//
16b1('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji ltar ba de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab/
16b2('bum): cing gsal bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi
16b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
16b4('bum): snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gau khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom
16b5('bum): ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba
16b6('bum): des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal
16b7('bum): bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//
17a1('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// steng gi
17a2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma rnaMs kyis de bzhin
17a3('bum): gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston no snyam mo// 'dzam
17a4('bum): bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba langs spyod kyi mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du
17a5('bum): sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
17a6('bum): sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// byang gi sgra mi snyan
17a7('bum): gyi mi rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pi sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo//
17b1('bum): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na/
17b2('bum): bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin
17b3('bum): gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par/
17b4('bum): gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong
17b5('bum): nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta
17b6('bum): bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di skams du sem par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnam
17b7('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bcug shing chos ston to snyam mo// nga/
18a1('bum): ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun/
18a2('bum): na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin
18a3('bum): gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di
18a4('bum): snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gyi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas
18a5('bum): cho ga mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// snang ba'i lha rnams kyis
18a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam me
18a7('bum): chung snang gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na
18b1('bum): bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur to// de bzhin gshes
18b2('bum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems
18b3('bum): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// dge ba'i lha rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong na/
18b4('bum): sa pa gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/
18b5('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog
18b6('bum): mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin
18b7('bum): gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gsheg pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhug shing chos ston to snyam mo// che ba'i lha rnams
19a1('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
19a2('bum): shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung che'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
19a3('bum): bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems
19a4('bum): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas cho ga mi
19a5('bum): shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi de bzhin
19a6('bum): gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam
19a7('bum): mo// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bad
19b1('bum): cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sem/
19b2('bum): par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas cho ga mi shes pa
19b3('bum): mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
19b4('bum): pa'i sku lta bas cho ga mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// de bzhin du stong
19b5('bum): gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
19b6('bum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga bas
19b7('bum): chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sem par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po
20a1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
20a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdan seng ge'i khri la bzhug nas 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/
20a3('bum): yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar rnam
20a4('bum): lce phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur
20a5('bum): to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma skad
20a6('bum): kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar lce'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
20a7('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi kham gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'og gi
20b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya
20b2('bum): bar mi sbyor ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid da ltar
20b3('bum): byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// dngos po med
20b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// ngo bo nyid
20b5('bum): stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma 'ongs pa
20b6('bum): zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'das pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro//
20b7('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma 'ongs pa zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams 'das
21a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thab cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyeng po dag na/
21a2('bum): sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gi kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
21a3('bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
21a4('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gi kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
21a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to//
21a6('bum): byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
21a7('bum): khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
21b1('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to//
21b2('bum): 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
21b3('bum): snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to//
21b4('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/
21b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs
21b6('bum): gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gyi
21b7('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/
22a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
22a2('bum): 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang
22a3('bum): thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum
22a4('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang
22a5('bum): thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin
22a6('bum): chen yod pa zhes bya yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang
22a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi kham de na/ byang chub sems dpa'
22b1('bum): 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// sher lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang
22b2('bum): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
22b3('bum): dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/
22b4('bum): sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22b5('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub padage slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams
22b6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom
22b7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs
23a1('bum): ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
23a2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed
23a3('bum): der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub
23a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par
23a5('bum): 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar
23a6('bum): de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi marjed der song shig de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyi
23a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung ba la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgya la byung ba/ gser gi mdog can stong bkur ste/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das
23b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa chen g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa
23b2('bum): mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
23b3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du
23b4('bum): byung ba dang / dogs 'di lta bu cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
23b5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
23b6('bum): rigs kyi 'di ni nub phyogs log su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mched ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
23b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
24a1('bum): shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
24a2('bum): phye ma dang / na gza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gi rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing
24a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24a4('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu
24a5('bum): 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
24a6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog
24a7('bum): bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das
24b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/
24b2('bum): sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste pad+mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la/ de bzhin gshegs pa
24b3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/
24b4('bum): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar/
24b5('bum): dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
24b6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las pad+mo gser gi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa'
24b7('bum): khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/
25a1('bum): pa byas so// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
25a2('bum): brgya pa// / bam po gnyis pa// / de nas lho phyogs logs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
25a3('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
25a4('bum): sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
25a5('bum): yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba
25a6('bum): chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
25a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
25b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan/
25b2('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
25b3('bum): gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten
25b4('bum): gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te// pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid
25b5('bum): brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gi thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
25b6('bum): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan
25b7('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phung dud du bya'o// mchod
26a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'/
26a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa tham
26a3('bum): cad la dbang rab tu thob pa'i de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal
26a4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
26a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/
26a6('bum): gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom lnga/
26a7('bum): 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod ngam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog
26b1('bum): sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de
26b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
26b3('bum): sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs
26b4('bum): logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
26b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/
26b6('bum): 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
26b7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mched der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
27a1('bum): bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/
27a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
27a3('bum): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan
27a4('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das
27a5('bum): la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod par zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog
27a6('bum): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal
27a7('bum): gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/
27b1('bum): mya ngan med pa'i dpal
27b2('bum): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan
27b3('bum): 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro zhes kyang bgyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
27b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyam par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
27b5('bum): dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las pad me gser gyi
27b6('bum): mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugasu 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
27b7('bum): du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams
27b8('bum): cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / gdug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur
28a1('bum): @/ phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug
28a2('bum): pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
28a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de la
28a4('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i
28a5('bum): rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa'
28a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
28a7('bum): gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems
28b1('bum): lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba
28b2('bum): der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing /
28b3('bum): 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid btsas te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
28b4('bum): byang chub nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag kyis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom
28b5('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phung dad du byas so// mchod pa byaso//
28b6('bum): de nas nub phyog logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
28b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
29a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes
29a2('bum): par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
29a3('bum): 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes kyang bgyis la/ pad mo 'di dag kyis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
29a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba bka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
29a5('bum): po sprod pa'i blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa
29a6('bum): de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugasu 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang
29a7('bum): bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
29b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom
29b2('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'bros la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
29b3('bum): der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems
29b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang sboms par 'jug pa tham
29b5('bum): cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/
29b6('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29b7('bum): chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
30a1('bum): gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad
30a2('bum): me de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di
30a3('bum): nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub
30a4('bum): sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
30a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gro byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams
30a6('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i
30a7('bum): dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten
30b1('bum): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / pu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sem
30b2('bum): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste/
30b3('bum): phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bes phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i
30b4('bum): blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phres/ bcom ldan
30b5('bum): 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ skra nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod ngam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can bdab
30b6('bum): ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
30b7('bum): slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
31a1('bum): mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
31a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
31a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun
31a4('bum): kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad
31a5('bum): du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der
31a6('bum): song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la pad mo
31a7('bum): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pi sangs rgyas shAkya thub
31b1('bum): gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
31b2('bum): bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
31b3('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du
31b4('bum): byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
31b5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
31b6('bum): 'di ni lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
