31b7('bum): dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i
32a1('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdug dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / pu dud du bya ba dang /
32a2('bum): mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
32a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/
32a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
32a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po// bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes
32a6('bum): par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
32a7('bum): rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
32b1('bum): pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gdod pa ma mchis sam/ gzo ba dog bde 'am/ skra nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mo gser
32b2('bum): gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das
32b3('bum): la mchod pa'i slad du skar ro// zhes kyang bgyis la/ pad+mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi
32b4('bum): khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba dka' ba yin gis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal
32b5('bum): bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan
32b6('bum): pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
32b7('bum): de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji skad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / bdug spos dang /
33a1('bum): rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'che skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
33a2('bum): phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug bya/
33a3('bum): snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
33a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
33a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher
33a6('bum): g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
33a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di/
33b1('bum): thub pas/ pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
33b2('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
33b3('bum): sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis zos par gyur pa de dag thams cad
33b4('bum): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i
33b5('bum): gzugasu 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
33b6('bum): la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas byang shar gyi phyogs tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
33b7('bum): snyeng 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
34a1('bum): @rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
34a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas/ rnam par gnon pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu
34a3('bum): las byung ba/ gser gi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bco
34a4('bum): ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ skra nyams dang ldan ma/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog
34a5('bum): can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal
34a6('bum): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de
34a7('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang
34b1('bum): ni lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
34b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol
34b3('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ston te 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
34b4('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi
34b5('bum): khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen skur ba
34b6('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyom
34b7('bum): par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/
35a1('bum): gcig tu khyod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
35a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das snyan mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma
35a3('bum): mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo dam pad+ma gyi mdog can mngab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan
35a4('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom
35a5('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
35a6('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ de nas pad me de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de/
35a7('bum): dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad me de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos
35b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting /
35b2('bum): nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal re las pad mo gser gi mdog can mngab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang /
35b3('bum): bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas
35b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spros dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
35b5('bum): na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing /
35b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
35b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu khod do// phyogs
36a1('bum): der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
36a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa
36a3('bum): dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag
36a4('bum): na pad mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi kham
36a5('bum): mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems
36a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/
36a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo ngas pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten
36b1('bum): bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa/
36b2('bum): dang rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sarba/
36b3('bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du bya'o// mchod pa byas so// de nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
36b4('bum): snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
36b5('bum): sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston
36b6('bum): pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang /
36b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gang nang
37a1('bum): sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi
37a2('bum): bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba dka' ba
37a3('bum): yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
37a4('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang
37a5('bum): bu mo'i gzugasu 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji
37a6('bum): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang /
37a7('bum): rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
37b1('bum): gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang /
37b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par
37b3('bum): 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes
37b4('bum): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems
37b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
37b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba
37b7('bum): dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i
39a1('bum): rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to//
39a2('bum): chos bstan pa de sems can gyis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim
39a3('bum): pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu me'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
39a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi kham
39a5('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
39a6('bum): rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha
39a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug
39b1('bum): mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
39b2('bum): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs cig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
39b3('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa
39b4('bum): ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ skra nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma steng dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / btso
39b5('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// bcom ldan 'das de
39b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
39b7('bum): snying po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad
40a1('bum): de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
40a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
40a3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal
40a4('bum): cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag lta ba'i
40a5('bum): slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
40a6('bum): kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil
40a7('bum): 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la pad me rin po sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/
40b1('bum): pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
40b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
40b3('bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de
40b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
40b5('bum): rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang shar
40b6('bum): gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
40b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni
41a1('bum): / gyur nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos
41a2('bum): dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir
41a3('bum): bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
41a4('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
41a5('bum): gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
41a6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'o/
41a7('bum): sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par sbyong ngam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can mngab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldam 'das de bzhin gshegs
41b1('bum): rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/
41b2('bum): zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
41b3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// zhes kyang dgyes la/
41b4('bum): pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
41b5('bum): dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
41b6('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blang te/
41b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzug su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar
42a1('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
42a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
42a3('bum): nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang /
42a4('bum): sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
42a5('bum): rgyas gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las 'di skad
42a6('bum): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ci'i rgyu ci'i
42a7('bum): rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs ngam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sa
42b1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
42b2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
42b3('bum): snying po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor te/ de nas pad modo dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
42b4('bum): thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos
42b5('bum): bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
42b6('bum): po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang / rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
42b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// bu dung du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten
43a1('bum): dam pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
43a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu
43a3('bum): las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la
43a4('bum): snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can
43a5('bum): mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das
43a6('bum): la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro zhes kyang bgyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten
43a7('bum): gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
43b1('bum): dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/
43b2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo //
43b3('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
43b4('bum): chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pA la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
43b5('bum): ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang /
43b6('bum): de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub
43b7('bum): pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdug
44a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga'
44a2('bum): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ skra nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyong ngam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di
44a3('bum): dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro//
44a4('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi
44a5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad me/
44a6('bum): de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug
44a7('bum): po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tunges par
44b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las/ pad mo gser
44b2('bum): gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang
44b3('bum): 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad
44b4('bum): la me tog dang spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba
44b5('bum): dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das
44b6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
44b7('bum): phyogs gcig tu khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
45a1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher
45a2('bum): g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
45a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po pad mo dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni steng gi phyogs su 'jig
45a4('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
45a5('bum): shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//
45a6('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i dpal la
45a7('bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
45b1('bum): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/
45b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// pu dud du byas so//
45b3('bum): mchod pa byas so// de nas 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo can zhes bya ba yod de/
45b4('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
45b5('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba
45b6('bum): 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
45b7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad me'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
46a1('bum): n+ya n+ya/ dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gri gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
46a2('bum): bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba dka' ba yin gyis/ de nyams par gyur/
46a3('bum): ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad me'i
46a4('bum): dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug
46a5('bum): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs
46a6('bum): shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
46a7('bum): ngan ngag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bu dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu
46b1('bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de dag kun kyang bal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so
46b2('bum): yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang sems par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
46b3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
46b4('bum): der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la/
46b5('bum): pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
46b6('bum): rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das sun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes
46b7('bum): 'dri ste/ pang po gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo
47a1('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol
47a2('bum): tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
47a3('bum): chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu me'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi
47a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so//
47a5('bum): bu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
47a6('bum): mdangs dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhags shing 'tsho skyong ste/
47a7('bum): de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sem
47b1('bum): chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
47b2('bum): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
47b3('bum): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'a//
47b4('bum): gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan
47b5('bum): pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du
47b6('bum): skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ 'og phyogs kyi 'jig
47b7('bum): rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis
48a1('bum): te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te/ de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
48a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan
48a3('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / de la phyag 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
48a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyems par 'jug pa/
48a5('bum): thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i
48a6('bum): dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/
48a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das
48b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byin pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/
48b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
48b3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa/
48b4('bum): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
48b5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig
48b6('bum): kyi bu 'di ni 'og gi phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra ba
48b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston/
49a1('bum): ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye
49a2('bum): ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed
49a3('bum): cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
49a4('bum): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod
49a5('bum): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
49a6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang
49a7('bum): ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod ngam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
49b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyam
49b2('bum): dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
49b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro zhes kyang gyis la/ pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs
49b4('bum): rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu ba yin gyis/
49b5('bum): der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
49b6('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang /
49b7('bum): khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grog te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom
50a1('bum): cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur te/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs/
50a2('bum): kyis kun tu gang ba dang / dang gi lda ldi dang / chun po kun nas bres pa dang / snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos sna tshogs 'khrul ba dang / dpag bsam gyi shing rgyan dang / 'bras bu
50a3('bum): sna tshogs kyis yal gi'i rtse mo g.yur zab me tog gi sheng dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dang / phreng ba'i shing dang / phye ma'i shing dang / bdug smos kyi shing sna tshoH/
50a4('bum): kyis brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun nas rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
50a5('bum): zhing gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gzi brjid chen po dag
50a6('bum): 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo can bzhin du gyur to// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ sbe pa'i'i le'u byed nga 'a'o//
50a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po gsum pa// de'i tshe de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis
50b1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
50b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad me de dag bzhes nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa
50b3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad me de dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+me
50b4('bum): de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos
50b5('bum): par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang /
50b6('bum): rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu me'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gi kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
50b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam zang
51a1('bum): ltung ba dang mi ltung ba med pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu
51a2('bum): byin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug
51a3('bum): pa med cing yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
51a4('bum): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mi
51a5('bum): dmigs pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
51a6('bum): la gnas te/ yang dag par spong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
51a7('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
51b1('bum): 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa mang po chog pa dang /
51b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa mang po de dag 'dus par thugasu chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal
51b3('bum): pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
51b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
51b5('bum): dpa' chen po chos thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
51b6('bum): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal to/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems pa' chen pos gnas pa med pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol
51b7('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa dang gtong ba yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yongs su btang ba med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzog par bya'o// /
52a1('bum): la gnas te/ smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
52a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
52a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ tshad med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
52a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ gzugs med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongasu
52a5('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par thar pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad
52a6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnas te/ mthar kyis gnas pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mthar
52a7('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mngon par
52b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
52b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ stobs mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
52b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byang chub kyi yan lag mi dmig pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongasu rdzogs par
52b4('bum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lam mi dmig pa'i phyir/ 'bags pa'i lam yan lag
52b5('bum): brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ stong pa nyid mi dmig pa'i phyir/
52b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzog par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mtshan med pa ma
52b7('bum): meb pa'i phyir/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
53a1('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par 'thor ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shar dwa tin
53a2('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rus pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rus pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
53a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par tshig pa mi dmigs pi phyir/ rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shar
53a4('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi 'thun pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ zas la mi 'thun pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shar
53a5('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra
53a6('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i
53a7('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
53a8('bum): dge 'dun mi dmigs pa'i phyir
53b1('bum): shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'du
53b2('bum): shes dgu bsgom par bya ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
53b3('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'bu can mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'bru can gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
53b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rnag pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rnags pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
53b5('bum): pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par dmar ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
53b6('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par sngos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par smos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems/
53b7('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par zos pa mi dmig pa'i phyir/ rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
54a1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi rtag pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi rtag pa'i 'du
54a2('bum): shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/
54a3('bum): sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra da ti'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bdag med pa mi
54a4('bum): dmigs pa'i phyir/ bdag med pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
54a5('bum): mi sdug pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
54a6('bum): te/ 'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'chi ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
54a7('bum): gnas te/ dga' ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten thams cad la dga' bar mi bya ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shar da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
54b1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem
54b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ gtong ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
54b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lha mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
54b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dbug nang du rgyu ba mi dmigs phyir/ dbugs byi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// shar
54b5('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ skyo ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ skyo ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra
54b6('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'chi ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//
54b7('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lus mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//
55a1('bum): gnas te/ chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
55a2('bum): pa la gnas te/ gnyis su med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ gnyis su med pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
55a3('bum): pa la gnas te/ kun brdzob mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ kun brdzob shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
55a4('bum): gnas te/ 'dris pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'dris pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
55a5('bum): sgra ji bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sgra ji bzhin shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam
55a6('bum): par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa dang bcas rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
55a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa tsam mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod
55b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ yid brtan du mi rung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yid rten du mi rung ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems/
55b2('bum): dpa' chen pos/ she rab kyi pha rol tu dra pa la gnas te/ sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/
55b3('bum): chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ kun 'byung ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ kun 'byung ba shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
55b4('bum): pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'gog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'gog pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
55b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lam mi dmigs phyir/ lam shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha
55b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ zad pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
55b7('bum): phyin pa la gnas te/ mi skye ba mi dmigs phyir/ mi skye ba shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/
56a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ chub pa'i skye mched mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chub pa'i skye mched yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
56a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra
56a3('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par dgod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par dgod pa bzhi yongs su
56a4('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya la gnas te/ sa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sa bcu yongs su rdzogs
56a5('bum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ spyod pa bcu yongs su rdzog
56a6('bum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bzod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bzod pa bcu yongs
56a7('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lhag gi
56b1('bum): pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa med cing
56b2('bum): rnam par dpyod pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa med cing rnam par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yong su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
56b3('bum): chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ yongs su ma shes pa yongasu shes par bya ba'i dbang po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang
56b4('bum): po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ kun shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ kun shes
56b5('bum): pa'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ kun shes pa rig pa'i dbang
56b6('bum): po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ kun shes pa'i rig pa'i dbang po yongs su rdzog par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
56b7('bum): gnas te/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ zil gyis mnon pa'i skye mched yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
57a1('bum): ma nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol
57a2('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
57a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nor mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ nor bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
57a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtogs pa brgyad yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
57a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can gyi gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sems can gyi gnas dgu yongasu
57a6('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi dmigs
57a7('bum): pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
57b1('bum): bsam pa nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
57b2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
57b3('bum): byin pa la gnas te/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
57b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rig pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
57b5('bum): sems dpa' sems chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ so so yang dag par rig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
57b6('bum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi mjigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi mjig pa bzhi
57b7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ ma nyams pa mi dmig pa'i phyir/
58a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
58a2('bum): chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang / shes pa'i rnam pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i
58a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// bag chags kyi mtsham sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa'i
58a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// sha ra da~M tI bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes
58a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' skyon med par 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes
58a6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
58a7('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
58b1('bum): gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
58b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
58b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ snying rje chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
58b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dga' ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dga' chen po yongs su rdzogs par
58b5('bum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ btang snyoms mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ btang snyoms chen po
58b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa'i mchog thams cad ldan pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems pa/
58b7('bum): bos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
59a1('bum): khrims bsrung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil kyis gnan par 'dod pa'i
59a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnam
59a3('bum): bzod pa bsgom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
59a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus
59a5('bum): rtsom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil kyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
59a6('bum): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo bsam gtan la
59a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub
59b1('bum): par bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa las gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// mngon par
59b2('bum): shes pa drug la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod
59b3('bum): pa rnam par g.yo ba shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas cad kyi sa
59b4('bum): shes zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
59b5('bum): mang po thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i
59b6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa gtong ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa cig gis zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'i byang
59b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo tshul
60a1('bum): 'gyur snyam na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don
60a2('bum): du tshul khrims chung ngu bsrungs kyang thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na
60a3('bum): yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don tu bzod pa chung ngu bsgom kyang thabs mkhas
60a4('bum): bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na chad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyams na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa'
60a5('bum): chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus chung ngu brtsams kyang / thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
60a6('bum): pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
60a7('bum): byin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don tu bsam gtan la chung ngu mnyam par bzhag kyang / thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu bsngo ba'i
60b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rig kyi bu dang rig kyi bu mo shes rab kyi
60b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa
60b3('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam
60b4('bum): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha
60b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rjes su
60b6('bum): yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
60b7('bum): sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa chung ngu byin yang thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na chad med grang med par
61a1('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin//
61a2('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi
61a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par dod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
61a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ ji ltar na tshe rabs thams cad du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis bskul bar 'gyur/
61a5('bum): ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas mnyes par 'gyur/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis yos su bzung bar 'gyur snyam na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
61a6('bum): bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
61a7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
61b1('bum): tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sems
61b2('bum): can thams cad kyi don tu shes rab chung ngu bsgoms kyang thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis/ ji lta bur na tshad med grangs med dpag
61b3('bum): tu med par 'gyur snyam na yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
61b4('bum): sems dpa' chen pos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
61b5('bum): bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
61b6('bum): byin pa yongasasu rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ bzod pa'o
61b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
61b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/
61b9('bum): sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
62a1('bum): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams
62a2('bum): cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la bsgrib
62a3('bum): ba med pa thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
62a4('bum): yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi rigs bsgrub
62a5('bum): par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyud mi gcad
62a6('bum): pa'i don du gnas par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i sa thob par 'dod
62a7('bum): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang
62b1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dpe' byad bzang po brgyad cu thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
62b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// tshe rabs kyi thams cad du tshe rabs dran pa thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
62b3('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub kyi sems mi stor ba thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
62b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi nyams pa thob par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i
62b5('bum): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig to'i mdza' bo dang / sdig to'i grogs po thams cad spang bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
62b6('bum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsnyen bkur bar 'dod pas/
62b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud dang / bdud kyi ris gtogs pa'i lha thams cad pham par bya bar
63a1('bum): dpa' chen po// zas dang skom dang gos dang rgyan dang / me tog dang bdug spos dang spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / gnas dang /
63a2('bum): nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / lhab lhab dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul
63a3('bum): dang / za shing gi ra ba dang / rgyal po'i srid la sogs pa yo byad dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par bya'o snyam na yang / shes rab kyi pha
63a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed
63a5('bum): dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i lam la dgod par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lngar
63a6('bum): dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mos pa thob pa la dgod par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//
63a7('bum): sha ra da ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtug pa'i sems can thas cad
63b1('bum): mi 'bral bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las 'da' bar
63b2('bum): 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs
63b3('bum): par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa gang dang
63b4('bum): gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rnam pa de
