237b1('bum): shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
237b2('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams la 'khro ba med
237b3('bum): pa dang / gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la/
237b4('bum): gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do//
237b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can
237b6('bum): rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
237b7('bum): po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/ sems can
237a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par brtson pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
237a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
237a3('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad yongasu sgrub cing //
237a4('bum): zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / spos
237a5('bum): 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang / gos
237a6('bum): 'dod pa rnams gos dang / rgyan 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang / 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnam la khyim gyis yongs su sdud cing / 'tshe
237a7('bum): ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gan
238b1('bum): chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan
238b2('bum): ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'
238b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dong zhing / sem
238b4('bum): can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
238b5('bum): yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'bags pa'i sangs
238b6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// /
238b7('bum): byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
238a1('bum): dmyal ba'i sems can rnams dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la
238a2('bum): ngan song thams cad las yang dag par zla ba'i phyir chos ston pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug
238a3('bum): la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sem
238a4('bum): can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
238a5('bum): yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs
238a6('bum): rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thog pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//
238a7('bum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag tu 'dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
239b1('bum): ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par bya
239b2('bum): ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po
239b3('bum): yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// lho nub kyi phyog
239b4('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
239b5('bum): chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan
239b6('bum): ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems
239b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// nub byad kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
239a1('bum): nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnams par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs
239a2('bum): rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu
239a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gi thog pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i
239a4('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i
239a5('bum): dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang ma thob par byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas
239a6('bum): kyang rgya che ba khyad par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis
239a7('bum): thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos
240b1('bum): phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /
240b2('bum): chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshanas
240b3('bum): yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa'
240b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
240b5('bum): tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas ste/ dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus
240b6('bum): yongs su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po'i dga' ba dang mos pa bskyed do// de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang sems mos
240b7('bum): par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthar kyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem
240a1('bum): dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang
240a2('bum): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung
240a3('bum): ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
240a4('bum): tshe gcig gi thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du dong zhing / sems can rnams
240a5('bum): la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam
240a6('bum): par bye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongasu bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
240a7('bum): mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// steng gi
241b1('bum): pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang / sbyin pa dang ngag snyan pas
241b2('bum): sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul
241b3('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma la gnas shing / de
241b4('bum): dag la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mi mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang / mchod pa sna
241b5('bum): tshogs kyis rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dad dang / mchod pa byed pa dag yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa
241b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med
241b7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i
241a1('bum): dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// ngag yongs
241a2('bum): su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// yid yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyir/
241a3('bum): pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba dag thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin du gsal ba de dag gis bdag mi stod cing / gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do//
241a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
241a5('bum): la gnas shing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul por mi 'gyur zhing / log par 'gro ba dang / ngan song du mi ltung ba dag kyang yod do//
241a6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyir chad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi la
241a7('bum): mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
242b1('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ lus gang dang ngag gang dang yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed
242b2('bum): pa'am/ gnod sems kyi sems bskyed pa 'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba
242b3('bum): de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so// ngag mi dmigs so// yid mi dmigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
242b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du ni shes pa bya ste/ de ni gnas med do//
242b5('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su/
242b6('bum): sbyong ngo // ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo // yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
242b7('bum): chen po rnams kyi lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji
242a1('bum): bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no// shar dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub
242a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyis mi 'byed do//
242a3('bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
242a4('bum): dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags// ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang
242a5('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing / 'di ni lus yin gyis des ni
242a6('bum): lus kyi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni ngag yin gyis des ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni yid yin gyis/ des ni yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na yang de ni sha ra dwa ti'i
242a7('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las bcom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o// shar dri ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
243b1('bum): byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
243b2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do// gsol
243b3('bum): ba/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
243b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang / ngag la dmigs pa med pa dang / yid la dmigs pa med pa
243b5('bum): dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs
243b6('bum): pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
243b7('bum): byin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpal
243a1('bum): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/ yid kyi
243a2('bum): gnas ngan len skyong ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs/ ngag mi
243a3('bum): dmigs/ sems mi dmigs/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ ngag gi gnas
243a4('bum): ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po dang po sems skyed
243a5('bum): phyin chad/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te/ gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu
243a6('bum): rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / ngag gi gnas
243a7('bum): ngan len dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
244b1('bum): med pa dang // sa'i khams rlom sems med pa dang / chu'i khams rlom sems med pa dang / me'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang /
244b2('bum): nam mkha'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzugs kyi khams la
244b3('bum): rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sgra'i khams la rlom sems med pa
244b4('bum): dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sna'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / dri'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sna'i rnam par she
244b5('bum): pa la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / ro'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa
244b6('bum): dang / lus kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / reg bya'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / yid kyi
244b7('bum): khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chos kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med dang // rten cing 'brel par 'byung
244a1('bum): theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
244a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la dmigs pa med cing / blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa de ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i
244a3('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do// gsol pa/ btso
244a4('bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams tshul ji lta ba bzhin du thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam byang chub
244a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / tshor ba la rlom sems med pa dang / 'du shes la rlom
244a6('bum): sems med pa dang / 'du byed la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mig dang gzugs la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba dang sgra la rlom
244a7('bum): sems med pa dang / sna dang dri la rlom sems med pa dang / lce dang ro la rlom sems med pa dang / lus dang reg bya la rlom sems med pa dang / yid dang chos la rlom sems
245b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang /
245b2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang /
245b3('bum): dbang po lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / stobs lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
245b4('bum): pa la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rlom sems
245b5('bum): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
245b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rlom
245b7('bum): sems med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems
245a1('bum): ba la rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang //
245a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang /
245a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang // nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / byi stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems
245a4('bum): med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus
245a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / thog ma
245a6('bum): dang tha med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / chos thos
245a7('bum): cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po
246b1('bum): ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/ mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/ lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang mi dang lha ma
246b2('bum): yin du bcas pa'i nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das
246b3('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes de dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi
246b4('bum): 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phong ba nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus
246b5('bum): yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem
246b6('bum): dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
246b7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam
246a1('bum): med pa dang / de bzhin pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig
246a2('bum): pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / byams pa chen po la rlom sems med pa dang / snying rje chen po la rlom sems med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
246a3('bum): la rlom sems med pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
246a4('bum): bu la rlom sems med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems
246a5('bum): med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / 'khor ba la rlom sems med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems
246a6('bum): med par gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa med do// sha ra dwa
246a7('bum): ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /
247b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams/
247b2('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // chos
247b3('bum): kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
247b4('bum): ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar lho'i phyog mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
247b5('bum): sangs gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang
247b6('bum): mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma
247b7('bum): snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa' dge
247a1('bum): par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig
247a2('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos
247a3('bum): kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
247a4('bum): chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
247a5('bum): sangs rgyas gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag
247a6('bum): kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de ba lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de
247a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
248b1('bum): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
248b2('bum): chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyedado// chos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi
248b3('bum): 'du shes mi skyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes pa mi skyed do// bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do// gzhan gyi 'du shes
248b4('bum): mi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do// ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de//
248b5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
248b6('bum): byin pa la spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so//
248b7('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
248a1('bum): 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po ye shes de lta
248a2('bum): bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
248a3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo //
248a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
248a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
248a6('bum): yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
248a7('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma god kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi klung gi byem snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// bya
249b1('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi gamigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ ngo bo
249b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
249b3('bum): bzhi sgom ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam mi dmigs so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi
249b4('bum): rkang pa bzhi sgom ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so// dbang po lnga bsgom ste/ dbang po rnams mi dmigs so// stobs lnga sgom ste/ stobs rnams
249b5('bum): mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ 'pha
249b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgoms/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so// bsam gtananas ni rtse
249b7('bum): bsam gtan rnams mi dmigs so// chad med pa rnams sgom ste/ tshad med pa rnams mi dmig so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/
249a1('bum): byin pa mi dmigs so// nad stong pa nyid sgom ste/ nad stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// byi stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi stong pa nyid
249a2('bum): mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmig so// chen
249a3('bum): bo stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/
249a4('bum): 'dus stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mtha'
249a5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa
249a6('bum): nyid sgom ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom ste/
249a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom ste
250b1('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
250b2('bum): sgom ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid sgom ste/
250b3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs so// rang byang chub sgom ste/ rang byang chub mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam shes pa nyid sgom ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs so// /
250b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/
250b5('bum): ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
250b6('bum): cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig lnga
250b7('bum): rab tu thob pa ste/ yongs su sbyong ba yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi
250a1('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa brgyad skos ste/ rnam par thar ba brgyad mi dmigs so//
250a2('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid
250a3('bum): mi dmigs so// mtshan ma med pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma med pa mi dmigs so// smon pa med pa sgom ste/ smon pa med pa mi dmigs so// mngon par shes
250a4('bum): pa rnams sgom ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so// ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/
250a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi dmigs so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi
250a6('bum): sgom ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mi dmigs so// byams pa chen
250a7('bum): ske ma ste/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs so// snying rje chen po sgom ste/ snying rje chen po mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom ste/ sangs
251b1('bum): gis dpag tshad dgu brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
251b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis
251b3('bum): gling gnyis pa mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis gling gsum pa mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
251b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
251b5('bum): sha'i mig gi stong 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
251b6('bum): mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra
251b7('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig
251a1('bum): mig go/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom
251a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
251a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen sha'i mig gis dpag tshad gnyis brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis
251a4('bum): dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i
251a5('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad lnga brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis
251a6('bum): dpag tshad drug brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bdun brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i
251a7('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgyad brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shi'i mig
252b1('bum): lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung snang gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
252b2('bum): tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
252b3('bum): dpas rab tu shes so// dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung dge'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni
252b4('bum): byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnas
252b5('bum): kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung che'i
252b6('bum): lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med tsha ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu
252b7('bum): shes so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// mi che bi'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang
252a1('bum): yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rna kyi
252a2('bum): mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
252a3('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
252a4('bum): dpas rab tu shes so// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas shes so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha
252a5('bum): mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas shes so// chang
252a6('bum): lha nye pan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni
252a7('bum): byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// snang ba'i lha rnams kyi/
253b1('bum): kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
253b2('bum): lha'i mig de ni tshang ba kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//
253b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung snang
253b4('bum): gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa'
253b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge ba'i lha rnams kyi
253b6('bum): mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung dge'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
253b7('bum): po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//
253b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni chung
253a1('bum): chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
253a2('bum): shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub ses dbas so//
253a3('bum): 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni
253a4('bum): rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so//
253a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lci'i mig de ni mche ma'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni dga' ldan
253a6('bum): gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems
253a7('bum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshangs chen gyi lha rnam
254b1('bum): kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig
254b2('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
254b3('bum): dpa' chen po ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta
254b4('bum): bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams
254b5('bum): kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
254b6('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
254b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes/
254a1('bum): che'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi
254a2('bum): shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
254a3('bum): po'i lha'i mig de ni mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so//
254a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig
254a5('bum): de ni gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// lha'i mig de
254a6('bum): lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang
254a7('bum): skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed/
255b1('bum): ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba 'am mi dge ba 'am/ kha
255b2('bum): na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das
255b3('bum): pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ chos gang yang ma mthong ba
255b4('bum): med/ ma zos pa med/ ma bsams pa med/ khong du chud pa med pa 'di ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig
255b5('bum): yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan
255b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag
255b7('bum): 'di ni chos rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro//
255a1('bum): lnga'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
255a2('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
255a3('bum): 'og kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i
255a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu
255a5('bum): shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// /
255a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po bcu gnyis pa// gsol pa/
255a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shar
256b1('bum): zag pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tsom dang / tshul
256b2('bum): khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam tu
256b3('bum): thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu bsrabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu
256b4('bum): bsgoms pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgom
256b5('bum): pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / mi rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag de ni dgra bcom pa'o//
256b6('bum): gang zag 'di ni smon pa lnga gnas pas ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin
256b7('bum): thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig chog pa
256a1('bum): dbang po lngas de ma zag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba
256a2('bum): skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig chog la lta ba dang / the tsom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul shugs bsnyems pa'i kun du sbyor ba
256a3('bum): gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i zhes bya'o// des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan
256a4('bum): sems rab tu bsrab par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin du bsgom pas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /
256a5('bum): gnod sems rab tu spong bar byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgom pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang //
256a6('bum): gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la
256a7('bum): gnas te/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma
257b1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
257b2('bum): byin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bsam gta/
257b3('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de'i rgyus dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan to// thabs mkhas
257b4('bum): pas ched du bsams te/ lus yongs su 'dzin par byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho
257b5('bum): rigs su skye'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// khyims bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// sum
257b6('bum): cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i nang du skye'o// mtshe ma'i lha'i nang du skye'o// dga' ldan gyi lha rnas kyi nang du skye'o// 'phrul dga'i lha'i nang du skye'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
257b7('bum): kyai lha'i nang du skye'o// de de dag na gnas shing / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de la rim gror byed par 'gyur ro//
257a1('bum): lta ba dang / the tsom dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhags bsnyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni
257a2('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// nges bsgom pa'i lam tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o//
257a3('bum): de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid
257a4('bum): de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag
257a5('bum): 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
257a6('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes bya bar shes pas dad pa la
257a7('bum): sogs pa'i dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
258b1('bum): shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i
258b2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang bkur sti dang /
258b3('bum): pu dud dang mchod pa byed do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
258b4('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang bkar sti dang / phu dad dang mchod pa byed do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
258b5('bum): sbed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang bkur sti dang / bu dud dang
258b6('bum): mchod pa byed do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
258b7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
258a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
258a2('bum): bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang
258a3('bum): mi ltung ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par
258a4('bum): 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
258a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o// 'di ni
258a6('bum): lung ma bstan pa'o// 'di ni nges pa'o// 'di ni ma nges pa'o// 'di ni lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog
258a7('bum): pa ste/ dbang po thob pa'o// 'di dag ni phyir mi ldog pa ma yin pa ste/ dbang po ma thob pa'o// 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 'di ni mngon par
259b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu dud dang mchod pa byed do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
259b2('bum): ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang bkar sti dang / phu dud dang mchod
259b3('bum): pa byed do// 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dis ni mngon par shes pa rnams thob par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o// 'di ni bzod pa
259b4('bum): thob pa ma yin no// 'di ni dbang po thob pa'o// 'di ni dbang po thob pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su
259b5('bum): dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b6('bum): dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang mi ldan pa'o// 'dis ni sems can rnam
259b7('bum): yongs su smin par byas so// 'dis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
259a1('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par
259a2('bum): byed do// rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu dud dang mchod pa byed do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing /
259a3('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu dung dang / mchod pa byed do//
259a4('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
259a5('bum): rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu dud dang mchod pa byed do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi
259a6('bum): bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang / bkur sti dang phudud dang /
259a7('bum): mchod pa byed do// 'og gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
260b1('bum): 'gyur ro// 'di dag la ni bdud yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongasu
260b2('bum): dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
260b3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rnam pa
260b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
260b5('bum): ba bco brgyad dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin/ btang snyoms chen po dang ldan
260b6('bum): pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa ldan pa yin/ de ni de'i mig ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mig de dang ldan pas/ rnam
260b7('bum): ba thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
260a1('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs pa brjod pa mdzad do// 'di ni legs pa
260a2('bum): brjod pa mi mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro// 'di dag ni nye bar
260a3('bum): gnas par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'di'i tshe'i ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro//
260a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'od dang dbyangs dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ni tshad med par 'gyur ro// 'di ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dang
260a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di ni
260a6('bum): ldan par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di ni spyod par mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no// 'di ni snying
260a7('bum): po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro// 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi
261b1('bum): 'thob ste/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myongs par byed do// de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed do// gcig tu 'gyur zhing mang por 'gyur ro//
261b2('bum): mang por 'gyur zhing gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang ba dang mi snang ba yang nyams su myong bar byed do// rtsig pa las thal ba dang / rab las thal ba dang / ri las thal
261b3('bum): bar thogs pa med pa'i lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na na mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la yang dkyil mo krung gis 'gro ste/ dper na mdab chags bya bzhin
261b4('bum): no// sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og tu 'dzul ba byed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la yang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper na sa la bya bzhin no//
261b5('bum): du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te/ dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la/ 'di ltar mthu che zhing 'di ltar dbang
261b6('bum): che ba dag kyang lag pas byug shing / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir
261b7('bum): zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang / rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'jug
261a1('bum): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i
261a2('bum): bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i
261a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub
261a4('bum): sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus shes
261a5('bum): brjod pa zhig du dgos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mig
261a6('bum): lnga bskyed pa'o// mig lnga po de dag la bslab pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
261a7('bum): 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu
262b1('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
262b2('bum): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya
262b3('bum): bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems la zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
262b4('bum): gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti
262b5('bum): mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag
262b6('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang bral ba'i sems la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so//
262b7('bum): bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nye bar len pa bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar len pa med pa'i sems la
262a1('bum): de lta bu mi dmigs te/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/ rdzu 'phrul lam/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub pa'i
262a2('bum): bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam
262a3('bum): pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas lha dang mi gnyis ka'i sgra
262a4('bum): thos te/ lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra nyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang /
262a5('bum): rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ rna ba dang sgrar dmigs pa med de/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/ lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa
262a6('bum): yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rna ba'i khams
262a7('bum): mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// des sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pha rol gyi sems sems kyis yang dag
263b1('bum): par grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma grol ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i
263b2('bum): sems shes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
263b3('bum): tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa med pa
263b4('bum): sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa
263b5('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzhan gyi sems shes
263b6('bum): ba des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do// de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni bdag shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//
263b7('bum): 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems mi dmigs te/ thams cad
263a1('bum): bar len pa med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun nas 'dus pa'i sems la kun nas
263a2('bum): 'dus pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji
263a3('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya chung ba'i sems la rgya chung ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya che ba'i seMs la rgya che
263a4('bum): bi'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
263a5('bum): shes so// tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam
263a6('bum): par bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar
263a7('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rnam
264b1('bum): zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni 'di srid gcig du 'dug 'dug/ tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag
264b2('bum): de nas shi 'phos nas/ ni che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang
264b3('bum): bcas/ ngan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes
264b4('bum): des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de ye shes ma yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni 'di ltar bdag gis rab tu shes
264b5('bum): so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ gang gi
264b6('bum): rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mi dmigs so// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi don tu bsam pa
264b7('bum): tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran
264a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid la bya ba ma gtogs par sems shes bya ba'i bsam pa'am/ sems shes par mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam btsam
264a2('bum): yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems
264a3('bum): dang spyod pa mngon tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bslab pa yin no// de ni gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rnam pa
264a4('bum): du ma mngon par sgrub ste/ sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pan+da/ sems brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// nyi ma gcig rjes su dran nas/ nyi ma brgya'i bar
264a5('bum): du yang rjes su dran no// zla ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas/ zla ba brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas/ lo brgya'i bar du yang rjes
264a6('bum): su dran no// bskal pa gcig rjes su dran pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa brgya phrag du yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa brgya
264a7('bum): stong du yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rus ni 'di
265b1('bum): kyi skye gnas dang / 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar mig de mig ma yin zhing
265b2('bum): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de dag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// de yang ji ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang /
265b3('bum): rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i mig te lta bu des mi dmig te/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs par lha'i
265b4('bum): mig gi bsam pa 'am/ lha'i mig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
265b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / lha'i mig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du
265b6('bum): bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par mi byed do// gang bla na med pa yang dag
265b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyang gang yang mi mthong ngo // de mngon par shes pa des/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/ bag
265a1('bum): pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can rnams
265a2('bum): 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu
265a3('bum): shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan du spyod pa ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnams la bskur
265a4('bum): pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sem
265a5('bum): can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ 'phags pa la
265a6('bum): skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhag nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu
265a7('bum): shes te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rna
266b1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
266b2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chags pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa
266b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
266b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ltung ba bya ba med pa nye bar bzung ba/ rnam pa thams cad
266b5('bum): pa mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
266b6('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam
266b7('bum): sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
266a1('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar byed de/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa des
266a2('bum): rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom
266a3('bum): sems med do// de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad
266a4('bum): pa'i ye shes mngon tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu'i mi dmigs so// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bya ba ma gtogs par zad pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam
266a5('bum): pa 'am/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang mi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
266a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang
266a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin spyod cing / mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ bla na med pa yang
266a8('bum): pa la de ltar
267b1('bum): pa med pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// de la sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdag so//
267b2('bum): tshul khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// bzod pa ni 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung ba
267b3('bum): las gdags so// ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdag so// shes rab ni 'chal pa nye bar bzung ba las gnas so// de ni rgal to zhes
267b4('bum): bya bar rlom sems med do// ma rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// sbyin pa mi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems
267b5('bum): med do// tshul khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// bzod pa phun sum tshogs so
267b6('bum): zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// khro ba can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// brtson 'grus brtsam pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// le lo can
267b7('bum): no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// shes
267a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus mi zhig pa nye bar bzung bas/
267a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
267a3('bum): ba'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'khrug pa med pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa
267a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
267a5('bum): pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ shes rab kyi 'tshal ba'i sems mi dmigs pa nye bar bzung bas//
267a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
267a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par nye bar bzung nas/ yongs su 'dzin
268b1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad la mnyam
268b2('bum): pa'i sems bskyed nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems
268b3('bum): can thams cad rab tu 'god do// de ni tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byin cing dben par bya ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
268b4('bum): cad dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba yin/ de ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang de dang de dag tu nam yang mig gis yid du mi
268b5('bum): 'ong ba'i gzugs mi mthong ngo // rna bas yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos so// snas yid du mi 'ong ba'i dri mi tshor ro// lce'i yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro mi myong ngo // lus
268b6('bum): kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i reg bya mi reg go// yid kyis yid du mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams rig pa med do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
268b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
268a1('bum): su dang sa khyod sems myed do// nas ma ma me / skyes se ma
268a2('bum): sems byed do// byag byas so zhes bya bar rnam sams med do// sa byam sa zhes bya bar rlos sem med do// rim gro ma byam sa zhes bya bar rlomamamam
268a3('bum): 'i phyi / ma kyis smras po zhes ba rlom sems med do// byas rgyas zhes sa rnam sems med / ma
268a4('bum): zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rlom sems pa
268a5('bum): dpas yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/ 'di la shar da ci'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyor pa'i tshe/ 'on nang
268a6('bum): sbed cig yod pa de dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/ de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyang yongasu
268a7('bum): sa gyi/ sa rgyam byin pa sa ma su gas gyis rnam pas ca sa bya ba nyid kyi mi par bye // gar rgya'i bug sa rgya
269b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi skal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug cus kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sem
269b2('bum): bskyed do// de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par 'gyur ro// de nyid du rab tu byung nas tshang
269b3('bum): pi'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas
269b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i tshe/ 'khor bzhi po 'di dag ni 'di na 'khord bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
269b5('bum): stong mthong bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs
269b6('bum): mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs
269b7('bum): rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to//
